## {{< fa basket-shopping >}} Ingredients

roll the **dice** on how much sugar you *want*.

```{r}
dice <- c(1,2,3,4,5,6)
amount_of_sugar <- sample(dice, 1)
```

## {{< fa kitchen-set >}} Procedure

You need to put `r amount_of_sugar` grams in a cup.
